title: Strawberry and mascarpone Swiss roll
description: This is one deliriously decadent pud: a light vanilla sponge with Marsala strawberries and a potently rich mascarpone cream. This is best eaten on a hot summer’s day with some fresh lemonade.
ingredients: 250g/9oz strawberries, hulled and sliced, plus extra to decorate
80g/3oz caster sugar, plus extra for finishing
½ vanilla pod or 2 drops vanilla extract
½ vanilla pod or 2 drops vanilla extract
